welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Caledonia, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our quaint city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport, serving all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Kenosha Regional Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
